title: Incompatible issues?
body:
Hello riot, 

I've Jst received the email and joined the beta however when I try to download the app it told me my device is incompatible. I use a Samsung Galaxy s4 which runs lollipop 5.0.1. Is this an issue with the app or I Jst can't use it

replies.body: Hey there! Your phone meets our min spec requirements...We're working to get our hands on an S4 on lollipop to see what's up.
Any updates? U still can't download the app
